TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Your wish was misunderstood by Jebediah Kerman, the almighty Kerbal in the Sky, and you morphed into a Liebherr LTM 1120-4.1 that appeared in my driveway. Apparently, he turned you into a crane (equipment) instead of a crane (bird).

I wish for another Mercedes-Benz Actros with a Meiller Kipper dump trailer completely full of Lego pieces.

The dump trailer has a gaping hole on the bottom, and almost all the LEGO™ fell out. The only pieces remaining are a 32x32 baseplate and a 1-stud round 'tile'

I wish for a better PC

You get the ENIAC computer. Have fun!

(I use a backhoe and scoop up the pieces that fell out. I could actually use a baseplate, as it would help with making the people walk around in my stop motion videos)

I wish for a MAN TGX with a Meiller Kipper dump trailer full of Lego pieces.

Edited May 16, 2021 by Ben J. Kerman
Oh, wait, the ENIAC wasn't a personal computer. Whatever.

but when you ride it, the Lego exploded.

i wish for Boeing 747 and Airbus A380 that was modified to be like Osprey V-22 and the hover engine was still Jet engine.

Uh, sure. It crashed on its first test flight.

 

I wish for a non explosive Kenworth T880 dump truck full of non-explosive Legos. I don't even care If I get to keep the truck.

You get the Legos, but the dump truck vanishes, taking it's cargo along with it to the Surface of the Sun.

I wish to own a fully functional, real to scale, in working order and armed Horten Ho-229 in real life

Granted.
You are standing near the fully yours, fully functional, real to scale, in working order and armed Horten Ho-229 in real life.
> The user M4A4 Sherman Firefly enters the chat.

I wish for a KSP crewed A4b.

Granted.

The a4b is 1/10 it's original size and you watch Jeb walk across the floor get into it, fly throught the window and fly away.

 

I wish for a Merkava 4 with 20 rounds of 120mm HE shells

Granted. But it's obstructed in a trench, and you don't have D9 to release it.

I wish I lived in Ultima VIII: Pagan.

(I just know everybody there and am familiar with their secret language.)

Granted

But after you leave the shrine, you get lost in the catacombs and end up stuck in the pit of death where a cave in blocks both openings.

 

I wish I could visit the island of Ferronrah. (I always liked the old Phantasie games)

but the second you arrive its subject to a nuke test.

 

i wish SU would come back (R.I.P)

(ok i somewhat think my wish was misread) su means Steven Universe

Edited May 23, 2021 by peridoot
contex

Granted. Today is Sunday again.

2 hours ago, Dientus said:

But after you leave the shrine, you get lost in the catacombs and end up stuck in the pit of death where a cave in blocks both openings.

Not granted. The local Kraken prevented this by crashing the game, as usually.

***

I wish for a cloudy day week.

Granted but Kerbal will fly around the air

 

I wish for fish

Granted.  Now you know what is "fishing" in sense of your money.

I wish, the anti-mosquito fumigator was able to kill every arthropod around. All of them. Just an arthropod-free desert, comfy for the mammals.

all gone, but, creatures like tiger, lion, fox, cat, dog, and more go inside your house and eat you alive!

i wish i had a car that fly and never land, yeah, never!

Edited May 24, 2021 by JB182

Granted. You are in that spacesuit, riding the orbital Tesla.

I wish to know, what was dripping this night near the window, when I saw nothing wet.

Granted, you didnt see the giant leak because you are blind. 

I wish that headache was gone.

it's gone, but you got a heart attack shortly afer it's gone

i wish KSP 1.12 was released now

Granted. You download it at 0.0000001 kbps. 

I wish for half of all the Legos in the world.

you got...  half piece of all legos in the world! but... its damaged

i wish non corrup this wihs

Granted. The hwis is corrputed not.

I wish for a 3rd season of The Order.

Granted. But it turns out COVID actually cured lycanthropy AND took the ability to cast magic leaving the rest of season 3 stale and normal.

 

I wish for a new PC

but the PC you got have very very very low resolution

i wish for a black cat

Granted. Bye.

Spoiler


I wish to try a fly in the sky.

Granted.

I wish for a Bugatti hypercar.
